title: Snowflake weekly, Snowsight, and feature release notes | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
This topic lists the release notes for the most recent weekly, Snowsight, and feature releases.
For releases earlier this year, see Earlier releases in 2024.

If you have questions about any of these features, please feel free to contact
Snowflake Support.
For weekly releases last year, see Earlier weekly releases in 2024.
For Snowsight and feature releases last year, see Earlier Snowsight and feature releases in 2024.
